name: chesto-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is asleep, it consumes this item to wake up. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when asleep to cure sleep.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from sleep on its own in battle.
